item.title: monster-sync-warped
item.dc:creator: wcmckee
item.description: There once lived a monster who was along. He walked a similar path each day. Each day he grew more sad. The other monsters stared at him as he walked the path. One foot in front of another. He kept his head down. Eyes focused on the path. When other monsters walked past he ignored them. Sometimes they would look back at him and wonder what was going through his head. More often though they would be in their own world and not notice him. Snow crunched beneath his feet as he climbed the stairs. The fresh air was good for his head. It made the pain go away.

item.title: Js13kGames
item.dc:creator: wcmckee
item.description:
Js13kGames is starting soon. It is a annual event that has happened since 2012. The jam runs for a month from 13:00 CEST, 13th August to 13:00 CEST, 13th September 2015. The theme will be announced at the start of the jam.

I don't think I'll enter this jam. The rules state the game must be written in javascript. Though I had ideas of writting something in Python that generates a HTML5 game. Perhaps a text based adventure game would be neat. I would also like to intergrate Twitter - something I have been exploring recently with Python.

I just had a search for Python to Javascript. One result I got was pyjs. Maybe I could enter something...
